title: To establish the Commission on Preemptive Foreign Policy and Military Planning.
content: Commission on Preemptive Foreign Policy and Military Planning Act - Establishes the Commission on Preemptive Foreign Policy and Military Planning to: (1) review the doctrine of preemption adopted by the President in the National Security Strategy of the United States of America of September 2002. And (2) assess the consequences and implications of the doctrine for foreign policy and military planning.
